parameters.query:
SELECT 
  message_id,
  whatsapp_id,
  received_at
FROM corev4_message_dedup
WHERE whatsapp_id = '={{ $json.whatsapp_id }}'
  AND received_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 seconds'
LIMIT 1;

assignments.name: contact_exists
assignments.value: ={{ $('Fetch: Contact Record').first().json.id != null && $('Fetch: Contact Record').first().json.id !== undefined }}

assignments.name: message_content
assignments.value: ={{ $('Merge: Audio and Text').item.json.message_content ?? $('Execute: Normalize Evolution Data').item.json.message_content }}

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO corev4_message_dedup (
  message_id,
  whatsapp_id,
  received_at,
  processed
) VALUES (
  '={{ $('Execute: Normalize Evolution Data').item.json.message_id }}',
  '={{ $('Execute: Normalize Evolution Data').item.json.whatsapp_id }}',
  NOW(),
  false
);
